benchmark_details.name: VBench-2.0: Advancing Video Generation Benchmark Suite for Intrinsic Faithfulness
benchmark_details.overview: VBench-2.0 is a next-generation benchmark designed to automatically evaluate video generative models for their intrinsic faithfulness along five key dimensions: Human Fidelity, Controllability, Creativity, Physics, and Commonsense.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To set a new standard for evaluation in video generation, pushing beyond superficial faithfulness toward intrinsic faithfulness.

data.source: Various video generation models including CogVideo, HunyuanVideo, and others for evaluation purposes.
data.size: 150,000 labeled real and generated human frame-level data.
data.annotation: Extensive human preference annotations for alignment with human judgment.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the evaluation dimensions focusing on intrinsic faithfulness.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in terms of intrinsic faithfulness.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative evaluations against current state-of-the-art models.
methodology.validation: Extensive human preference labeling and validation processes.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential societal impacts associated with AI-generated media.
